thread.title: GE Considers Atlanta as Headquarters Option, Bloomberg
thread.title_full: GE Considers Atlanta as Headquarters Option, Bloomberg

title: GE Considers Atlanta as Headquarters Option, Bloomberg
text:
GE Considers Atlanta as Headquarters Option, Bloomberg August 20, 2015, 07:10 AM Related: Ge Capital , General Electric Company 
Bloomberg reported that General Electric has held exploratory talks about relocating its headquarters to Atlanta from Connecticut, according to people familiar with the matter.According to the Bloomberg report, GE may meet with developer Tishman Speyer Properties in the coming weeks to discuss space in Atlanta’s Buckhead neighborhood, said the people, who asked not to be identified because details aren’t public. Dallas is also among the markets under study, one of the people said.GE declined to comment on the deliberations about Atlanta. 
To read the full Bloomberg report, click here . Today's Other News
